info.name: Two-Factor Authentication made easy
info.summary: Allow users to finally use an easy to use two factor mechanism.
info.description: Allow users to login to their Nextcloud using a user friendly method. As an exxtra checks users will be presented with a button they have to click and the text to only click this button if they are the actual user which makes sure no unauthorized access is granted.
info.author: Roeland Jago Douma
